RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 5F Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Purse 23800. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE AUGUST 16, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 16 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming RacesF or $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023). (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OUT OF CENTS rallied four wide, took command at eighth pole, won ridden out. SEXY CHOCOLATTE steadied backstretch, second best. HUMPTY GRUMPTY led, weakened. OMEGA GOLD tired. UNBRIDLEDSELECTION no factor. IN THE GOSPEL outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Unbridledselection
ENTRY.OWNER: Bernardini Jay P and Navy Chief's Racing Stable

ENTRY.NAME: Out of Cents
ENTRY.OWNER: Coleswood Farm Inc and G L M Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied four wide, took command at eighth pole, ridden out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 16 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(WV A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CASTLE REVIEW dueled three wide, driving. HOV LANE led, second best. YARBOROUGH mild bid. IN TO THE NIGHT no threat. VINEGAR VEGGIES dueled inside, tired.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 92. Claiming Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 16 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $8,500 Or Less Not Considered). (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OX DOC set pace, driving. CASANOVA KITTEN tried winner, second best. ENJOY BASEBALL held show. FOREVER POE no threat.

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Calumet Farm & Dr. & Mrs. Charles Huber

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 16, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 16 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In E ligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEL MAR FLASH led, headed briefly on turn, won driving. SHAK'S HIDDEN GEM chased, led briefly, second best. RORAIMA got show. CYBERBURG brief speed, weakened.

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Red Barons Barn, LLC, Rancho TemescalLLC & Vaya Con Suerte

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Claiming Purse 10300. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LITTLE FOUR dueled for lead, opened lead, held driving. NOGRATZ rallied. MARPIN contested pace, held show. IT'S A BIG SONG evenly. MAGIC CALL up close early, tired. NIKITA outrun. ADMIRAL ALLIE outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 5F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 16 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PREMIER WISH settled off leader, rallied, won driving. W H LITTLE MISS GO rallied for place. OFFTHEROADAGAIN weakened late. BOUJEE KITTEN lacked bid. MISS NUCKOLS set pace, tired. NURSE KATIE outrun. SMOOKIE outrun.

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: C. Kidder, N. Cole, R. Kinder,E. Woolsey & P. Needham

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 5F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 16 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEST CHOICE BABY stalked leader, moved to lead at the eighth pole, won driving. CHOCO ROCO rallied while saving ground, second best. OSBIN opened clear lead, weakened late. ANGUSONIC chased, tired. PER DIEM wide, dull effort. LAKE HAMILTON outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Best Choice Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, moved to lead at the eighth pole, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Choco Roco
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied while saving ground, second best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5F Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 16 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRINCESS LEAN dueled from inside, won handily. SPUNKY ZOEY second best. LUNAR PRAYER set pace, weakened.
